name: MySQL5
queryCode:
SELECT
	* 
FROM
	(
	SELECT
		t1.id,
		t1.`name` AS `title`,
		NULL AS `addedBy`,
		NULL AS `addedDate`,
		NULL AS `editedBy`,
		NULL AS `editedDate`,
		1 AS `ISFAVOURITES`, 
		'doclib' as DOCQTYPE,
                 t1.doclibsn as docsn
	FROM
		zt_doclib t1 
	WHERE
		t1.collector LIKE CONCAT_WS( '', '%,', #{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname}, '%,' ) 
		AND t1.deleted = '0' UNION
	SELECT
		t2.id,
		t2.`name` AS `title`,
		NULL AS `addedBy`,
		NULL AS `addedDate`,
		NULL AS `editedBy`,
		NULL AS `editedDate`,
		1 AS `ISFAVOURITES`, 
		'module' as DOCQTYPE,
                t2.modulesn as docsn 
	FROM
		zt_module t2 
	WHERE
		t2.collector LIKE CONCAT_WS( '', '%,', #{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname}, '%,' ) 
		AND t2.deleted = '0' UNION
	SELECT
		t3.id,
		t3.title AS `title`,
		t3.addedBy,
		t3.addedDate,
		t3.editedBy,
		t3.editedDate,
		1 AS `ISFAVOURITES`, 
		'doc' as DOCQTYPE,
                 t3.docsn 
	FROM
		zt_doc t3 
	WHERE
		t3.collector LIKE CONCAT_WS( '', '%,', #{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname}, '%,' ) 
	AND t3.deleted = '0' 
	) t1
